title: Crystal Falls Hometown Pharmacy
cleaned_text: Here are a few of our most popular services at our pharmacy location. Hometown Pharmacy offers a wide range of services expanding further than the typical prescription refill that you'd expect from a pharmacy. From proactive health tests, wellness programs, a full front end gift & boutique area, and even long term care solutions, Hometown Pharmacy has you covered for all of your needs. Stop in today! The Crystal Falls Pharmacy serves the small city of Crystal Falls, Michigan and the surrounding area. The pharmacy joined the Hometown Pharmacy family in 2019. We are a member of the Crystal Falls Business Association and participate in many community events. We also donate to fund raising events in the community.
